mapper.select: SELECT COCKTAIL_SEQ as cocktailseq, COCKTAILNAME, COCKTAILNAME_EN, INGREDIENT, RECIPE, IMAGERINK, COLORVALUE, RECOMMAND, HITCOUNT FROM COCKTAIL2
SELECT COCKTAIL_SEQ as cocktailseq, COCKTAILNAME, COCKTAILNAME_EN, INGREDIENT, RECIPE, IMAGERINK, COLORVALUE, RECOMMAND, HITCOUNT FROM COCKTAIL2 WHERE COCKTAIL_SEQ = #{value}
SELECT COCKTAIL_SEQ as cocktailseq, COCKTAILNAME, COCKTAILNAME_EN, INGREDIENT, RECIPE, IMAGERINK, COLORVALUE, RECOMMAND, HITCOUNT FROM COCKTAIL2 WHERE COLORVALUE = #{value}

SELECT USERCOCKTAILSEQ, USEREMAIL, USERCOCKTAILNAME, USERCOCKTAILNAME_EN, USERALCOLE, USERLIQUEUR, USERMATERIAL, USERRECEIPE, SAVEFILENAME, ORIGINALFILENAME, USERCOLORVALUE, USERHITCOUNT, USERRECOMMAND FROM USERCOCKTAIL WHERE USEREMAIL = #{userEmail}

SELECT COCKTAIL_SEQ as cocktailseq, COCKTAILNAME, COCKTAILNAME_EN, INGREDIENT, RECIPE, IMAGERINK, COLORVALUE, RECOMMAND, HITCOUNT FROM ( SELECT COCKTAIL_SEQ, COCKTAILNAME, COCKTAILNAME_EN, INGREDIENT, RECIPE, IMAGERINK, COLORVALUE, RECOMMAND, HITCOUNT FROM COCKTAIL2 ORDER BY RECOMMAND DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
mapper.update: UPDATE COCKTAIL2 SET RECOMMAND = RECOMMAND + 1 WHERE COCKTAIL_SEQ = #{value}
mapper.select: select INGREDIENT_SEQ as ingredientSeq, INGREDIENT, CLASSIFY from ingredient where CLASSIFY like 'A_' order by ingredient_seq
select INGREDIENT_SEQ as ingredientSeq, INGREDIENT, CLASSIFY from ingredient where CLASSIFY like 'F_' order by ingredient_seq
select INGREDIENT_SEQ as ingredientSeq, INGREDIENT, CLASSIFY from ingredient where CLASSIFY like 'L_' order by ingredient_seq
select INGREDIENT_SEQ as ingredientSeq, INGREDIENT, CLASSIFY from ingredient where CLASSIFY like 'M_' order by ingredient_seq

SELECT cocktail_seq, count(*) COUNT FROM( select i.COCKTAIL_SEQ, i.INGREDIENT from( select cocktail_seq, cocktailname from cocktail2 where colorvalue = '${color}' ) test, COCKTAIL_INGREDIENT i WHERE test.cocktail_seq = i.cocktail_seq AND REGEXP_LIKE(i.INGREDIENT, '${regexp}') ) group by cocktail_seq
